data.name: Vampires! - Wallpapers & OST
data.detailed_description:
Special Offer

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1231840


About the Game

This DLC includes Original Sound Track of "Vampires!" game and some wallpappers.

Tracks:
- The Castle Beyond the Forest
- Horror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: Core2Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: QuadCore
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD2000 or better
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: DualCore
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA 950
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9+
  • Processor: DualCore

  • Storage: 20 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+, GLSL 1.2+, 256 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/SteamOS
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1+, GLSL 1.2+, 256 MB VRAM
